title: Gitai Saimin (Alien Hypnosis)
synopsis: Shinta is just an average student. But one day, a tentacle-shaped alien suddenly parasitizes in his penis. Shinta complains about it, but the alien answers there will be no problem because it can mimic. Shinta decides to satisfy his sexual desire using this power....
related_anime: ['Gitai Saimin: Gitai-hen', 'Gitai Saimin: Saimin-hen', 'Saimin Gakuen', 'Saimin Jutsu The Animation 2nd']
staff: [['Yoshino, Keiko', ['Original Character Design']], ['Tsubone, Kentarou', ['Editing']], ['Black Rainbow', ['Original Creator']], ['Yoshi.Hoka', ['Music']]]
